DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Educating Physical Therapists Treatment Patients With Nonspecific Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The training `` Update treatment patient nonspecific chronic low back pain '' announce social network member study . Interested physical therapist send email one study author information regard inclusion criterion . After two month notice , interested eligible physiotherapist randomize two group 15 participant . The study arm : 1 ) control group ( physical therapist receive training ) 2 ) experimental group ( physical therapist receive training ) . Before training , attitude , belief knowledge low back pain guideline evaluate . Each physical therapist recruit study total fifteen consecutive patient chronic nonspecific low back pain ( total sample=150 patient ) . All patient assess first session blind examiner unaware group allocation . Clinical outcome ( pain , disability , fear avoidance belief pain catastrophizing ) collect baseline 5 week , 3 6 month randomization . All statistical analysis conduct follow principle intention treat analysis between-group difference perform use Mixed Linear Models .
DOC.criteria: patient seek care chronic nonspecific low back pain ( define pain discomfort costal margin inferior gluteal fold , without refer symptom low limb , least 3 month ) , pain intensity least 3 point measure 010 pain numerical rating scale , age 18 65 year . physiotherapist treat exclusively patient musculoskeletal pain , duly accredited National Council Physical Therapy , physiotherapists offer private medical insurance treatment individually patient , last 5060 minute session , physiotherapists 2 five year graduation / work area period , treat least 2 patient low back pain per month , willing treat least 10 patient study . patient exclude contraindication physical exercise ultrasound short wave therapy , evidence nerve root compromise ( i.e one motor , reflex sensation deficit ) , serious spinal pathology ( fracture , tumor , inflammatory infectious disease ) , serious cardiovascular metabolic disease , previous back surgery pregnancy . physiotherapist want stop activity reason prevents participation study
